title: Add search functionality for conversation history
description:
# Add Search Functionality for Conversation History

## User Story
**As a** Consoul user
**I want** to search through my conversation history
**So that** I can quickly find past discussions and reference previous AI responses

## Description

Implement search functionality integrated into the ContextualTopBar (SOUL-55). The search feature should leverage the existing FTS5 full-text search capabilities in the ConversationList widget.

## Context

The ContextualTopBar (SOUL-55) provides a dedicated search input area. This ticket implements the search functionality that connects the top bar search input to the ConversationList.search() FTS5 method, displays filtered results, and handles search interactions.

Reference: ConversationList already has FTS5 search implemented (conversation_list.py search() method)

## Technical Notes

**Integration:**
- Add SearchBar widget to ContextualTopBar center zone
- Wire SearchBar input changes to ConversationList.search()
- Display search results in ConversationList
- Highlight matching conversations
- Handle search clear/reset

**Search Features:**
- Real-time search as user types
- FTS5 full-text search across conversation messages
- Show result count in UI
- Clear button to reset search
- Keyboard shortcuts (Ctrl+S to focus search, Esc to clear)

## Acceptance Criteria

**Given** I type in the search bar in ContextualTopBar
**When** I enter search terms
**Then** the ConversationList filters to show matching conversations

**Given** I have search results displayed
**When** I clear the search input
**Then** the ConversationList shows all conversations again

**Given** I press Ctrl+S
**When** the keyboard shortcut is triggered
**Then** focus moves to the search input in the top bar

**Given** I search for a specific term
**When** matches are found
**Then** the result count displays in the top bar

## Dependencies

**Prerequisites:**
- SOUL-55 (ContextualTopBar must exist with search input area)
- ConversationList search() method (already implemented)
